GSD.description:
dmaengine: imx-sdma: Fix a possible memory leak in sdma_transfer_init

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.10 by commit ce4745a6b8016fae74c95dcd457d4ceef7d98af1. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: dmaengine: imx-sdma: Fix a possible memory leak in sdma_transfer_init
